description: The identified underlying Cause is a Local Privilege Escalation and SAML Token Signature Bypass Vulnerability in VMware environments. This vulnerability allows unauthorized users to gain elevated privileges on nix machines running under VMware, which could lead to significant security ramifications. It has been detailed in VMware Security Advisories VMSA-2023-0024 and VMSA-2023-0019. Failure to apply the recommended updates could leave systems exposed to exploitation. Therefore, it is crucial for system administrators to address this vulnerability promptly by following the update guidelines provided in the advisories.
